sentences.english: In the meantime, however, the practice will continue.
sentences.chinese: 然而，與此同時，現實情況還在繼續。

sentences.english: That may be the dream but, as Chan notes, the reality is often different.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是個夢想，但據陳說，現實情況通常都很困難。

sentences.english: So the percentages don't tell you the reality.
sentences.chinese: 所以百分比並不能說明現實情況。

sentences.english: It’s time you awoke to the realities of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 現在是你認識當前的現實情況的時候了。

sentences.english: The criminal regulations of evidence are made alone, which suits the reality of judicial practice in our country.
sentences.chinese: 刑事證據規則單獨立法符合我國司法的現實情況。

sentences.english: Chapter VI proposes five-point policy proposals on the basis of the reality.
sentences.chinese: 第六章從現實情況基礎上提出了五個方面的對策建議。

sentences.english: The reality is indeed confirmed Lee Sang Yu said.
sentences.chinese: 現實情況確實印證了李相禹所言。

sentences.english: The truth is, they control the supply lines," said Goodson.
sentences.chinese: 現實情況是，巴基斯坦控制着補給路線。

sentences.english: You will have to imagine a new reality.
sentences.chinese: 你必須得想象一個全新的現實情況。
